New portfolio redesign

15 June 2010

After two months beavering away, I’ve launched a new design for this portfolio site. I hand-crafted the HTML/CSS and built the WordPress theme from scratch.

This design is the fifth version of my site. It reflects the positioning and thinking I’ve done this year.

The design’s core comes from some detailed study of grid layouts and trying out a new approach to content strategy. This made for some odd conversations with myself, as both client and designer.

For now, I’m just pleased to launch the site. I hope you like it. As ever, any feedback, suggestions or ideas would be appreciated.
